CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1969, pg. 6, reads: "Organize Black Catholic Knights - Officers of Council 157, Knights of St. Peter Claver, which was organized at St. Brigid's-St. Benedict The Moor Church on a recent Sunday morning, and those who conducted the Installation Rites are pictured above... 2), right, shows Bishop Vincent Leonard, prelate of the Pittsburgh Diocese, who conducted the special mass, seated. Officers in this picture, reading from left are: Earl Wright, lecturer; Alan Steward, recording secretary; Ralph Harper, Homer Harris, deputy grand knight; Edward Saey, warden; Lorenzo Gibson, outer guard and Ken Robinson, auditor.-Harris Photo."image published by New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, with Bishop Vincent Leonard masked; addition of two men, possibly Ralph Harper and Edward Saey, from negative 2001.35.3996.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Knights of St. Peter Claver officers, from left including: Earl Wright, Alan Steward, Ralph Harper, Homer Harris, Edward Saey, Lorenzo Gibson, and Ken Robinson standing behind Bishop Vincent Leonard, posed in St. Brigid's-St. Benedict The Moor Church
